about_the_game:
A Short Interrogation Game Taking Full Advantage of ChatGPT

You are tasked with interrogating the suspect [AI] of a murder crime as an [excellent police officer]. How you choose to interrogate the suspect is up to you. How the AI reacts is rendered in real-time through ChatGPT.
In addition, an emotional circuit is programmed into the AI, raising its heartbeat as the interrogation progresses, making it want to confess as its uncomfortability rises.
This is a short story that you can finish in about 10-15 minutes of playtime.

Why are You Interrogating an AI? A Mystery, Indeed...

At the beginning of the story, you are made to participate in a mysterious game.
"Welcome to Doki Doki AI Interrogation. You are an [excellent police officer]. Conduct a superb interrogation."
After you succeed in making the AI confess, the real ""conversation with an AI"" will unfold.
A notable characteristic of this game is that the viral invention, Artificial Intelligence (AI), is not just incorporated into the game system, but also plays a vital part in the story.

An Only One Experience. Game Play that Changes Every Time

There is an infinite amount of possibilities when it comes to the words you choose to tell the AI, as well as its responses.
A heartwarming tale can be spun, just as easily as it can turn into a comediac conversation.
Have fun building your very own experience.
This game is also well suited for let's play videos and game streaming (you are given full permission to stream any part of this game free of cost...but it will be nice if you let us know if you do! We will check you out! When streaming this game, kindly include the URL to this store page.)

Things to Keep in Mind

- This game is run using ChatGPT developed by OpenAI. The gameplay may be affected depending on how overloaded the ChatGPT servers are.
- If there are any changes applied to ChatGPT services operated by OpenAI, please be informed that this game service may be suspended or terminated without notice.
